name: Madness Triangle
description:
Madness Triangle is my first game, I made this for a game jam themed limit. It's a non-violent thinking based game, where you need to figure out how to open the door.

I would love to say, Please check out the game, it's free and review it through comments <3. 

The game currently lacks a lot of interesting stuff I have planned for later, but it's still good.

If you have a windows 10 64 bit rig, this game is the best suit for you.

Thank you for reading :)
